body: This is so hot, give up Kaori, your body was made to be a dairy cow.

This is probable the first Manga to have me saying wow.wtf is up all this sex I wanna see more of the character dealing with being pushed into the culture of the dairy cow girl . Also it really got me to say fuck Shiho and the other one.
I want to like this, but goddamn fucking Mind Break that isn't even in the tags.
After first reading I didn't really like this but I kept occasionally thinking about it and after reading it again I somehow really like it now.
